C

canPlayCard(Card) - Method in class model.Player
Checks if the player can play a specific card based on the game rules.
canPlayHandCard() - Method in class model.Player
Checks if the player can play the card in hand based on the game rules.
Card - Class in model
Represents a playing card with a specific rank, suit, and face orientation.
Card(Rank, Suits) - Constructor for class model.Card
Constructs a new Card with the specified rank and suit, initially face-down.
CardImagesLoader - Class in utilites
The CardImagesLoader class provides methods for loading card images.
cardsSwitchAnimation(ImageView, Integer) - Method in class controller.GameController
Initiates the animation for switching two cards on the table.
clubs - Enum constant in enum class model.Suits
 
controller - package controller
 
currentPlayerDiscards() - Method in class model.Game
The current player discards a card to the waste pile.

The current player draws a card from the deck.
currentPlayerDrawsFromWastePile() - Method in class model.Game
The current player draws a card from the waste pile.
